1370: Eggerdus was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Pietersen at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Pietersen, Jacob, at age 23.
1373: Had a son with Pietersen, Albertus, at age 25.
1374: Had a son with Pietersen, Haghen, at age 26.
1376: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Liudburgis, at age 28.
Lost son Jacob when Jacob was 6 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Geile, at age 30.
1381: Had a son with Pietersen, Helpriko, at age 33.
1385: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Pietersen, at age 37.
1386: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Aghete, at age 38.
1388: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Nannen, at age 40.
1389: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Hadewigis, at age 41.
